message.content:
I need to identify and extract the value of cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period from the financial statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement, I can see a line item specifically labeled "Beginning Balance" under the "Cash and Cash Equivalents" section. This is exactly what I'm looking for.

From the cash flow statement:
```
| Cash and Cash Equivalents |  | 2024-02-05 |
| Beginning Balance  | 8000000.00 | 2024-02-05 |
```

The beginning balance of cash and cash equivalents is clearly stated as 8000000.00.

I can also verify this by looking at the balance sheet, where the Initial_amount for "Cash on Hand" (3000000.00) and "Bank Deposits" (5000000.00) as of 2023-12-31 sum to 8000000.00, which matches the beginning balance in the cash flow statement.

{"solution": {'value': '8000000.00'}}
